Package com.gotenna.sdk.firmware

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader.GTFirmwareAmazonDownloaderListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the latest firmware file is downloaded from the Amazon S3 server.
    GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when firmware updating processes change.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader
    Download the latest goTenna firmware file from an Amazon S3 Bucket.
    GTFirmwareUpdater
    Handles updating the goTenna's firmware and notifies listeners about firmware update progress, as well as firmware update success/failure.
    GTFirmwareVersion
    A model class that represents a specific version of the firmware.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GTFirmwareAmazonDownloader.AmazonFirmwareBucket
    Indicates which Amazon Bucket the firmware file should be downloaded from.
    GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState
    Indicates the various possible states of the firmware updating process.
